title: Am i supposed to just wait?
body:
'ello y'all !
I got the riot kayle but no rp or the icon. What gives?
(ik riot said that everybody will get it but still)

replies.body: Waiting is the key here!  Gifts are still being sent out, and it's going to be a bit since there's so many eligible accounts.  Stay updated at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for any news.  Hang tight!

try to play a few games, maybe it'll come, and the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received a mystery gift by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket. #totallydidntcopypaste
Thanks  I know im gonna get it eventually but i wanted to make sure :P
